name: Carry Bilu
description:
Try not to get stressed! HAHAHA

I doubt you will complete the impossible mode! >.<

Have fun!! :)

Please tell me if you find any glitch/bug.

CarryBilu-> Story-based adventure/strategy/hard game, and an entry to Brackeys Jam 2020.2

The game was developed in under 5 days and follows the theme of Brackeys Jam 2020.2 and the theme: Rewind.
